questions.text: What ty pe of fracture is shown below according to Salter-Harris classification?
What is the earliest bony change of osteomyelitis on X-rays?
questions.explanation:
Ans. B) Periosteal reaction

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:
  • ➤ Periosteal reaction is the earliest bony change seen on the x-ray in case of osteomyelitis, after 7-10 days.

questions.correct_answer: B. Extraarticular fracture distal end of radius

questions.explanation:
Ans. D) d

Educational Objective:

  • ➤ Educational Objective:

  • ➤ The correct sequence of performing the Thomas test is:
  • ➤ Checking for lumbar lordosis
  • ➤ ↓

  • ➤ ↓

options.label: D

questions.correct_answer: A. a, b, c are correct
questions.explanation: Ans. A) a, b, c are correct
